sections.heading: Repealed.Section 22-2E-2 - Repealed.Section 22-2E-3 - Repealed.Section 22-2E-4 - Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 2011, ch. 10, § 1; repealed by Laws 2019, ch. 249, §4.

Repeals.— Laws 2019, ch. 249, § 4 repealed 22-2E-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2011, ch. 10, § 1, relating to short title, effective June 14, 2019. For provisions of former section,seethe 2018 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 2011, ch. 10, § 3; repealed by Laws 2019, ch. 249, §4.

Repeals.— Laws 2019, ch. 249, § 4 repealed 22-2E-3 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2011, ch. 10, § 3, relating to rating certain schools, effective June 14, 2019. For provisions of former section,seethe 2018 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 2011, ch. 10, § 4; 2013, ch. 196, § 3; 2015, ch. 108, § 3; repealed by Laws 2019, ch. 249, §4.

Repeals.— Laws 2019, ch. 249, § 4 repealed 22-2E-4 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2011, ch. 10, § 4, relating to annual ratings, letter grades, ratings based on standards-based assessments, right to school choice, distance learning, responsibility for cost, use of funds, additional remedy, effective June 14, 2019. For provisions of former section,seethe 2018 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
